com.mopub.nativeads

Interface MoPubAdRenderer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The ad payload type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MoPubNativeAdRenderer

    public interface MoPubAdRenderer<T>
    An interface for creating ad views and rendering them using ad data. Normally you will use the subclass MoPubNativeAdRenderer with ViewBinder to customize your ad view with your own layout. However, if you wish to programmatically create or manage your ad view, you can implement MoPubAdRenderer} directly.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.view.View createAdView(android.content.Context context, android.view.ViewGroup parent)
      Creates a new view to be used as an ad.
      void renderAdView(android.view.View view, T ad)
      Renders a view created by createAdView(android.content.Context, android.view.ViewGroup) by filling it with ad data.

    • Method Detail

      • createAdView

        android.view.View createAdView(android.content.Context context,
                               android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Creates a new view to be used as an ad. This method is called when you call MoPubStreamAdPlacer.getAdView(int, android.view.View, android.view.ViewGroup) when the convertView is null. You must return a valid view.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent that the view will eventually be attached to. You might use the parent to determine layout parameters, but should return the view without attaching it to the parent.
        context - The context. Useful for creating a view.
        Returns:
        A new ad view.

      • renderAdView

        void renderAdView(android.view.View view,
                  T ad)
        Renders a view created by createAdView(android.content.Context, android.view.ViewGroup) by filling it with ad data.
        Parameters:
        view - The ad View
        ad - The ad data that should be bound to the view.
